com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap

Class BootstrapText.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beardedhen.androidbootstrap.BootstrapText.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    BootstrapText

    public static class BootstrapText.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class should be used to construct BootstrapText instances. Text is appended to itself in the order in which it was added.

    • Constructor Summary
